def update_user(user_name, new_user_name): """ Updates a user's name.
:param user_name: The current name of the user to update. :param new_user_name: The new name to assign to the user. :return: The updated user. """ try: user = iam.User(user_name) user.update(NewUserName=new_user_name) logger.info("Renamed %s to %s.", user_name, new_user_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't update name for user %s.", user_name) raise return user
